page.title: 11Watford: Street Games
page.content:
In Watford the game{Hom Pom}is played quite a lot. The game itself is similar to hide and seek but slightly different. The rules are something like this.
A few people hide and one person seeks. The person who seeks has to count up to a certain number. When he finishes counting he or she has to start to seek. Whenever a person who is seeking finds another person he or she has to run to the post and say,"Hom Pom 1 2 3 I see (whoever) hiding behind (where-ever)." When everybody runs to the post, if there is anybody who gets caught, or is the last to be caught then they are "on" in the next game.{ {Hom Pom}is played a lot because there are lots of good places to hide behind.
